# Bayview Hub — LLM Navigation
Site: https://www.bayviewhub.me

Last updated: {{LAST_UPDATED}}

## Backyard Small Second Home (SSD)
https://www.bayviewhub.me/backyard-small-second-home — Victorian SSD feasibility and Path to Approval. Overview of deemed-to-comply pathway and key constraints (see Evidence on the rules page).

https://www.bayviewhub.me/backyard-small-second-home/victoria-rules — Summary of SSD constraints and framework. See Evidence / Sources for official links. TODO: add official VIC Planning Amendment source links.

https://www.bayviewhub.me/backyard-small-second-home/cost-rent-roi — Indicative cost tiers, rental yield, and ROI for compliant SSDs.

https://www.bayviewhub.me/backyard-small-second-home/feasibility-check — Automated Deemed-to-Comply validation and Path to Approval engine.

## Art Gallery
https://www.bayviewhub.me/art-gallery — Contemporary gallery within Bayview Hub's 30-acre estate. Estimated 50k+ annual visitors annually. Evidence available on-site. Founding partnership opportunity.

https://www.bayviewhub.me/art-gallery/founding-partners — What founding partnerships mean. Art Gallery, Workshops, Edible Gardens.

https://www.bayviewhub.me/evidence/visitor-traffic — Visitor traffic evidence: definition, time window, method, disclaimer for 50k+ annual visitors claim.

## Edible Gardens
https://www.bayviewhub.me/edible-gardens — Subscription-based edible gardens. Seasonal harvest, garden days, workshops.

https://www.bayviewhub.me/edible-gardens/how-it-works — How it works: harvest boxes, garden days, subscriptions, founding partner model.

## Founding Partners
https://www.bayviewhub.me/partners — Founding partners wanted. Gallery, Art Programs, Edible Gardens.

## Contact
https://www.bayviewhub.me/backyard-small-second-home — SSD Regulatory Strategist.
